title: This Will Go On Forever, and Ever:  More Jesus Pareidolia in the News
post: When I looked at the photo of the Shroud. I didn’t see coins or flowers or inscriptions or even Turin, but I did see Jesus.
author: Emmett McMahon

title: This Will Go On Forever, and Ever:  More Jesus Pareidolia in the News
post:
Personally, I see more than Jesus:  I see the unconditional love of God for EVERY ONE OF US (no matter his religion, faith, unbelief, color of skin, whatever), which was incarnated in a real human being like every one of us…  Like someone once told me: “Our lives are more precious in the eyes of God than his own life because he was willing to die for all of us!”  This crazyness (a God who consider the lives of his creatures as being more important than his own life) can only be understandable through the heart and not the brain…  And I think the more and more we contemplate the Shroud and the more and more we have some chances to finally understand this awesome truth full of hope for every one of us.
End of the preach (for today). :-)
author: Anonymous
